mapper.select: SELECT activity.aid,event.eid,person.pid,person.studentid,person.name,event.name,event.location,event.start_time,event.end_time,event.type, event.size,event.remark,event.organizer,activity.evaluation from person,event,activity WHERE person.pid = activity.pid AND activity.eid = event.eid and person.name = #{name};

SELECT activity.aid,event.eid,person.pid,person.studentid,person.name,event.name,event.location,event.start_time,event.end_time,event.type, event.size,event.remark,event.organizer,activity.evaluation from person,event,activity WHERE person.pid = activity.pid AND activity.eid = event.eid and event.type = #{type};

SELECT activity.aid,event.eid,person.pid,person.studentid,person.name,event.name,event.location,event.start_time,event.end_time,event.type, event.size,event.remark,event.organizer,activity.evaluation from person,event,activity WHERE person.pid = activity.pid AND activity.eid = event.eid ORDER BY event.start_time;
